Hattie Rose Hawkins

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Hoppkins
  2. Foster Name:
  3. Foster Family: Al and Lena Schlosser
  4. Location of Family: Unknown
  5. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  6. Arrival Place: Falls City, NE

  9. Date of Death: 1941-07-01
  10. Gender: female
